description: gray and black ink, red chop marks on beige; tray with three legs, topped with vertical garden shapes in feathery gray, strong black brush marks at edges; three vertical lines of characters; red chop mark at left of characters, two red chop marks to right of characters; beige and blue silk brocade mount; black scroll bar
dimension:
22 1/4 x 11 15/16 in. (56.52 x 30.32 cm) (image)
54 7/16 x 16 5/8 in. (138.27 x 42.23 cm) (overall, excluding scroll bar)
title: Bonseki (Tray Garden)
